bibl.title: Some Aberdeen Fragments of Iliad 4 Newly Joined to Fragments in Berlin and Alexandria.
bibl.note: P. Aberd. 106 (= Pack2 714) belongs to the same roll as P. Alex. Inv. 80 + P. Berol. Inv. 7119 (= Pack2 707) [rééd.: IDEM, Iliad 4.188-213: P. Alex. inv. 80 + P. Berol. inv. 7119 Col. I, ArchPF 49 (2003) pp. 1-12 et pl. I]. Fayum (?), first half (?) of the first century A.D. - 1. The contents of the roll. - 2. The nature and date of the hand. - 3. Transcription, collation and commentary. - 4. Conclusion.

bibl.idno: P. Alex. Inv. 80 + P. Berol. Inv. 7119

bibl.note: APTHORP Michael J., Some Aberdeen Fragments of Iliad 4 Newly Joined to Fragments in Berlin and Alexandria.
ArchPF 51 (2005) pp. 40-58 et pll. V-VII + XIII dépl. h.t.
141.4 P. Aberd. 106 + P. Alex. Inv. 80 + P. Berol. Inv. 7119
